strategies.name: Extreme Fear Accumulation
strategies.thesis: Fear & Greed < 15 historically marks BTC capitulation bottoms (2018, 2020, 2022). Mean reversion edge is strong.
strategies.backtest: Each cycle (2018, 2020, 2022): 3-8x from entry to next top
strategies.kill: BTC breaks $60K with no F&G recovery, or 3 consecutive losses at F&G < 15

strategies.name: Volatility Spike Mean Reversion
strategies.thesis: >3% BTC move in <15min reverts 60-70% of the time within 2-4 hours. Overextended moves attract counter-trend flow.
strategies.backtest: 60-70% win rate, avg 1.5-2% per trade (literature + daemon testing)

strategies.name: Funding Rate Basis Trade
strategies.thesis: Long spot BTC + short equal perp = collect funding rate, market neutral. In bull markets funding runs 50-100%+ annualized.
strategies.kill: Funding drops < 5% annualized, or BTC spot diverges >10% from perp
strategies.pnl: N/A — needs exchange API keys (Beau holds)

strategies.name: Drawdown-Based DCA (BTC adaptation of NexusTrade TQQQ strategy)
strategies.thesis: Scale buy size based on BTC drawdown from ATH. Larger buys at deeper drawdowns compound better than flat DCA.
strategies.backtest: (TQQQ proxy):** +356% bull 2020-2022, -53% bear 2021-2023, +0.18% vs -35% during recovery. Consistently beats buy-hold o...
strategies.status_note: ✅ WOULD BE IN AGGRESSIVE BUY ZONE

strategies.name: MSTR vs BTC NAV Arbitrage
strategies.thesis: MSTR trades at premium or discount to its BTC NAV. Premium > 2x = relative short MSTR / long BTC. Discount < 1.1x = relative long MSTR / short BTC.
strategies.backtest: MSTR has ranged from 0.8x to 3.5x NAV premium. Mean reversion trades documented.
strategies.kill: Premium structurally reprices (post-ETF integration), NAV calculation breaks

strategies.name: Bitcoin Deep OTM Calls in Low IV
strategies.thesis: When BTC IV rank < 25%, OTM calls 50-100% above spot are cheap lottery tickets. BTC halving cycles produce exactly these payoffs.

strategies.name: Liquidation Cascade Short
strategies.thesis: High funding + extreme open interest = crowded longs. When they flush, it's fast and violent. Short into the cascade.

strategies.name: New CEX Listing Front-Run
strategies.thesis: Binance/Coinbase listings average 50-200% move on announcement. Buy immediately on announcement, sell into spike.

strategies.name: Prediction Market Arbitrage (Polymarket)
strategies.thesis: Crowd probability estimates on Polymarket are often miscalibrated for complex events. Well-researched positions against crowd irrationality win.

strategies.name: DeFi Delta-Neutral Yield
strategies.thesis: Provide liquidity in stablecoin pairs or hedge LP position to capture yield without impermanent loss.

strategies.name: BTC Rainbow Chart Cycle Trading
strategies.thesis: Rainbow chart bands identify macro over/undervalued zones across halving cycles. Buy in blue/green zones, reduce in red/orange.

strategies.name: Polymarket Oracle Latency Arbitrage
strategies.thesis: Price inefficiencies between Polymarket resolution and on-chain oracle settlement create brief arb windows
